channel.title: FDA on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in FDA on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: RFK Jr.‘s CDC may limit COVID shots to 75 and up, claim they killed kids
item.description: A battle is brewing over mRNA vaccines, which could intensify backlash against Kennedy.

item.title: Pfizer says this season’s COVID shot boosts immune responses fourfold
item.description: Positive results come as Americans face confusing access rules that vary by state.

item.title: Who can get a COVID vaccine—and how? It’s complicated.
item.description: We’re working with a patchwork system, and there are a lot of gray areas.

item.title: CDC finally gets a director; FDA’s top vaccine regulator exits under pressure
item.description: Senate confirmed Susan Monarez to CDC while Vinay Prasad made a quick exit from FDA.

item.title: Senate confirms CDC director as top FDA official resigns under political pressure
item.description: Senate confirmed Susan Monarez to CDC while Vinay Prasad made a quick exit from FDA.

item.title: Psychedelic Therapy Crashed and Burned. MAHA Might Bring It Back
item.description: Abuse allegations and infighting helped kill a campaign to legalize MDMA for medical use. Trumpworld is giving the therapy’s advocates hope for a second shot.

item.title: Psychedelic Therapy Crashed and Burned. MAHA Might Bring It Back
item.description: Abuse allegations and infighting helped kill a campaign to legalize MDMA for medical use. Trumpworld is giving the therapy’s advocates hope for a second shot.
